page.title: 05 Launceston General Hospital
page.content: Launceston Hospital is part of Plymouth's group. It was built in 1936-7,but various buildings have been added since.It employs 35 staff,-24 nurses.They have 2 wards and 4 side wards.The most common cause of accidents are domestic,industrial injuries and traffic accidents.They have a post natal unit.If needs arise a flying squad can come from Plymouth. Major surgery is not done.The elderly can be fetched.The land on which the hospital is built used to be marshland and a pump under the building drains the land all the time.They employ 3 full time cooks and all meals are cooked in the hospital at the moment but from September the meals are to be cooked in Plymouth and frozen before coming to Launceston.
